class WXDLLEXPORT wxXml2Node

Detailed Description

Represents the data owned by a wxXml2Node. wxXml2Node, in fact, uses reference counting; in this way you can always use (and you should use) wxXml2Node directly (without using pointers or references) like you would use wxString. See wxXml2Node for more info.
